MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the G45 postcode area of Glasgow. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to safely complete repairs we needed to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:21pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:26pm on the 22nd of January 2021
